articles.title: Meta Builds AI Infrastructure With NVIDIA
articles.summary: NVIDIA today announced a multiyear, multigenerational strategic partnership with Meta spanning on-premises, cloud and AI infrastructure.

articles.title: Dassault Systèmes and NVIDIA Partner to Build Industrial AI Platform Powering Virtual Twins
articles.summary: Dassault Systèmes (Euronext Paris: FR0014003TT8, DSY.PA) and NVIDIA today announced a long-term strategic partnership to establish a shared industrial architecture for mission-critical artificial intelligence across industries.
